a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Time spent on paid work or study, per day, men vs women
Average minutes spent on paid work or study, per day, by sex (ages 15-65). Estimates come from time-use surveys
and include both weekdays and weekends. The survey years differ across countries. See the source description for
the survey year used for each country.
Minutes spent on paid work or study - men (15-65)
Minutes spent on paid work or study - women (15-65)
Note: Paid work or study includes activities such as: paid work (all jobs); travel to and from work or study; time in school or classes;
research/homework; job search; other paid work or study-related.
